channel.title: Need someone to explain what is a null in server
channel.description:
Ok I dunno if this is the right section but it seems to be the client that the items are nulls. (Defenders) Why does it come up as a null in the server? and how do I make it not?
thanks

item.title: Need someone to explain what is a null in server
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Could be several causes.

its not declared in class 8.
the model is not added.
its not declared in your server. (item.cfg or class files)

Check if the item is declared in both the server and client.
A null means either the server or the client doesn’t recognise a object.
or something is malformed.

Read full topic
item.source: Need someone to explain what is a null in server

item.title: Need someone to explain what is a null in server
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

Then the model for the Defender isn’t added or added correctly
